dct_title_s: [A correct sea-chart of the whole World, according to Mr. Wright's (commonly called Mercator's) Projection]
dct_description_sm: From: Atlas maritimus & commercialis, chart 2/ [John Senex], 1728, following p.198.
California as an island with indented northern coast and few place names. New globular projection justified by Dr. Halley. Copperplate engraved.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
